column2: our waitress Ella was so great. The waitstaff totally acts as a cohesive team
column3: and they don't spread servers too thin. It made the whole evening great. Before we were ever seated
column4: staff was coming around with complimentary lite bites. I tried the cucumber
column5: and even though I don't typically like cucumber
column6: this was good. Be aware that they only serve beer
column8: and sake. I love that because it allows them to be more expert in those areas.
